title.rendered: Join a Book Club in Middle Georgia!

content.rendered:
Gottwals Books is proud to promote two local book groups.

One club meets at Bare Bulb Coffee in Kathleen. E-mail Tara by clicking here for more information!

The Middle Georgia Book Club meets at the Coffee Cup in downtown Perry. More information can be found at http://middlegeorgiabookclub.blogspot.com
